items.title: How to Dominate the Next Social Platform, According to Duolingo’s Playbook
items.description: The language-learning app moves fast to build a loyal audience.

items.title: A Delta Flight Was Landing Late and Passengers Were Anxious. What the Flight Attendant Did Next Was Brilliant
items.description: Using principles of empathy, the flight attendant transformed a group of strangers into a team on a mission.

items.title: Going Global? How to Hire Ethically While Growing Your Business
items.description: Successful overseas hiring means fair pay, not breakneck cost cuts that harm local workers and economies.

items.title: The 1 PTO Policy So Bad It Should Be Illegal
items.description: Unlimited PTO sounds great, but this twist on an already suspect policy is horrible.

items.title: This Report Says Most People Don’t Have ‘Quality Jobs.’ Here’s How Your Business Can Change That
items.description: Getting the right balance of pay, reliable scheduling, and employer support can make any job better, and boost employee engagement.
